content:
Sure, here are the questions without the answers:

1. What command can you use to view the contents of a directory?
2. How do you create a new directory in Linux?
3. What command can you use to display the contents of a file in the terminal?
4. What command can you use to create a new file in Linux?
5. How do you move a file in Linux?
6. How do you copy a file in Linux?
7. How do you delete a file in Linux?
8. What command can you use to search for a specific file in Linux?
9. How do you rename a file in Linux?
10. What command can you use to change the permissions of a file or directory in Linux?
11. How do you create a symbolic link in Linux?
12. What command can you use to view the size of a file in Linux?
13. How do you view the contents of a file in reverse order?
14. What command can you use to view the first 10 lines of a file?
15. How do you view the last 10 lines of a file?
16. How do you display the contents of multiple files at once in Linux?
17. What command can you use to sort the contents of a file?
18. How do you count the number of words in a file in Linux?
19. What command can you use to display the calendar in Linux?
20. How do you check the disk usage of a directory in Linux?
21. What command can you use to compress a file or directory in Linux?
22. How do you extract a compressed file or directory in Linux?
23. What command can you use to monitor system resources in Linux?
24. How do you terminate a running process in Linux?
25. What command can you use to see a list of running processes in Linux?
26. How do you view the contents of a compressed file without extracting it?
27. What command can you use to download a file from the internet in Linux?
28. How do you install a package using the package manager in Linux?
29. What command can you use to update the package list in Linux?
30. How do you remove a package using the package manager in Linux?
31. How do you list all installed packages in Linux?
32. What command can you use to check the version of Linux you are running?
33. How do you shut down or restart the system in Linux?
34. What command can you use to view the contents of the system log in Linux?
35. How do you create a user in Linux?
36. How do you add a user to a group in Linux?
37. What command can you use to change the password of a user in Linux?
38. How do you remove a user from the system in Linux?
39. How do you change the hostname of the system in Linux?
40. What command can you use to view the IP address of the system in Linux?
41. How do you set a static IP address in Linux?
42. What command can you use to test network connectivity in Linux?
43. How do you start a service in Linux?
44. How do you stop a service in Linux?
45. What command can you use to list all installed services in Linux?
46. How do you enable a service to start automatically at boot time in Linux?
47. How do you disable a service from starting automatically at boot time in Linux?
48. How do you check the status of a service in Linux?
49. What is the difference between a process and a thread in Linux?
50. How do you view the environment variables in Linux?
51. What command can you use to set an environment variable in Linux?
52. How do you unset an environment variable in Linux
